box.title: Accessions Entered in the Last 3 Months
box.sql: select number, accessionId, TimestampCreated From accession where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) <= TimestampCreated order by TimestampCreated desc

box.title: Permits Entered in the Last 3 Months
box.sql: select permit.PermitNumber, permit.PermitID, permit.EndDate From permit where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) <= TimestampCreated order by permitNumber asc

box.title: CITES Permits Expiring This Year
box.sql: select permit.PermitNumber, permit.PermitID, permit.EndDate From permit where ( lower(Type) like '%CITES%') and year(CURDATE()) = year(EndDate)

box.title: Non-CITES Permits Expiring This Year
box.sql: select permit.PermitNumber, permit.PermitID, permit.EndDate From permit where ( lower(Type) not like '%CITES%') and year(CURDATE()) = year(EndDate)
